LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays sticky or ticker-style banners for Lightning and Experience pages

property.name: mode
property.label: Display Mode
property.description: sticky shows one dismissible banner; ticker scrolls all active banners.

property.name: tokenPreset
property.label: Token Preset
property.description: Base design token preset. Individual token properties override preset values.

property.name: stickyTopOffset
property.label: Sticky Top Offset
property.description: Top offset for sticky mode (e.g. 10px).

property.name: stickyWidth
property.label: Sticky Width
property.description: Width for sticky mode (e.g. 90%).

property.name: stickyMaxWidth
property.label: Sticky Max Width
property.description: Max width for sticky mode.

property.name: stickyBorderRadius
property.label: Sticky Radius
property.description: Border radius for sticky mode.

property.name: stickyShadow
property.label: Sticky Shadow
property.description: CSS box-shadow value for sticky mode.

property.name: tickerBackgroundColor
property.label: Ticker Background
property.description: Ticker bar background color.

property.name: tickerTextColor
property.label: Ticker Text Color
property.description: Ticker text color.

property.name: tickerEdgeFadeColor
property.label: Ticker Edge Fade Color
property.description: Color used by left/right ticker fade overlays.

property.name: tickerEdgeFadeWidth
property.label: Ticker Edge Fade Width
property.description: Width of left/right ticker fade overlays.

property.name: tickerSpeedSeconds
property.label: Ticker Base Speed (s)
property.description: Lower values scroll faster. Final speed scales with number of active records.

property.name: infoColor
property.label: Info Banner Color
property.description: Hex color for Info variant banners

property.name: errorColor
property.label: Error Banner Color
property.description: Hex color for Error variant banners

property.name: warningColor
property.label: Warning Banner Color
property.description: Hex color for Warning variant banners

property.name: successColor
property.label: Success Banner Color
property.description: Hex color for Success variant banners
